name: Aganorsa Leaf - Casa Fernandez Aganorsa Maduro - Robusto Extra
brand: Aganorsa Leaf, Casa Fernandez Aganorsa Maduro
additionalNotes: The Aganorsa maduro boasts the same vintage Nicaraguan long-fillers from Aganorsa as the original Corojo version. The twist comes in the form of a well-aged San Andres maduro wrapper leaf adorning the top pf the blend. Heady notes of chocolate, sweet cream, and coffee cascade over the palate with a medium to full-bodied strength bumping this offering up to the top of many connoisseurâ€™s lists.
